mapper.insert: INSERT INTO notice (title, content, status, notice_image, views) VALUES (#{title}, #{content}, 'active', #{noticeImage, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 0)
mapper.select:
select count(*) from notice
where title like '%' || #{pageRequest.searchKeyword} || '%'
where content like '%' || #{pageRequest.searchKeyword} || '%'
where title like '%' || #{pageRequest.searchKeyword} || '%' or content like '%' || #{pageRequest.searchKeyword} || '%'

select count(*) from event where status= #{status}
and category = #{category}
select * from ( select id,title from notice where id < #{id} order by created_at desc ) where rownum = 1
select * from ( select id,title from notice where id > #{id} order by created_at asc ) where rownum = 1
mapper.update: UPDATE notice SET status='inactive' WHERE id=#{id}
UPDATE notice SET status='active' WHERE id=#{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO event (category, title, content, start_date, end_date, status, event_image, views) VALUES (#{category}, #{title}, #{content}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, 'active', #{eventImage, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 0)
mapper.update: UPDATE event SET category = #{event.category}, title = #{event.title}, content = #{event.content}, start_date = #{event.startDate}, end_date = #{event.endDate}, event_image = #{event.eventImage} WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE event SET status='inactive' WHERE id=#{id}
